@ClareUK2316 @MeTooEP @EU_Justice @EUHomeAffairs @AnniHirvela @EverydaySexism @EUauditors @ThePauzi @JumpEquality @isabellajump Nothing wrong with strengths and weaknesses unless you use these against people. Just because, generally, men are physically stronger than women, we should not shame a man who doesn't comply with the #genderstereotype and call him less of a man if he is short and slender, for ex.

@TimeCarpenter @MeTooEP @EU_Justice @EUHomeAffairs @AnniHirvela @EverydaySexism @EUauditors @ThePauzi @JumpEquality @isabellajump What women are interested in and work for (construction, military, tech, etc) is up to them to decide. When you doubt their capacities just because they are women, you stop showing respect and you start showing #sexism. #StopSexism

@TimeCarpenter @MeTooEP @EU_Justice @EUHomeAffairs @AnniHirvela @EverydaySexism @EUauditors @ThePauzi @JumpEquality @isabellajump No one says men are not good at their craft (or graft). #Genderstereotypying starts when you decide women cannot be equally good. Show respect. #StopSexism
